derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French, from questionner 'to question'

entry.def: A questionnaire is a written list of questions which are answered by a lot of people in order to provide information for a report or a survey.

example.ex: Headteachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire.
example.tran: 校长们将被要求完成一份问卷调查。

means.word_mean: 1. a form containing a set of questions; submitted to people to gain statistical information

stems_affixes.word_buile: question问题;询问+aire表名词或形容词→n.调查表, 问卷 adj.质问的

in进入+quest寻求,询问→问进去→审问
quest寻求,询问→n.探寻,探求;寻求,追求
